oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Dr. Edmund Allen Taylor to his wife
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. Taylor of Haywood County, Tennessee writes a series of letters to his wife as he travels from Jackson, Tennessee to Chattanooga by stage. The trip was made in September 1855. This first letter is not dated. He describes recent rains and the towns he; passes through as well as the quality of the land. He goes on to descibe his fellow travellers. Two of the men in the coach are former law students from Cumberland College and the other a student at the Western Military Institute in Nashville, Tennessee.
